channel.title: Rebecca Juro Show
channel.description: The LGBT Internet radio talk show which puts the 'T' FIRST! Trans & Queer news, activism, commentary, music, and more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The LGBT Internet radio talk show which puts the 'T' FIRST!
channel.itunes:author: Rebecca Juro
channel.itunes:summary: The LGBT Internet radio talk show which puts the 'T' FIRST! Trans & Queer news, activism, commentary, music, and more!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show May 3, 2012
item.description: It's a jam-packed show with Becky's take on a pastor who calls for abuse of gender-variant children; the latest on CeCe McDonald; a Texas transgender woman charged with disorderly conduct for using the bathroom; NAT GEO's American Transgender; Aetna Insurance denying a mammogram to a transgender policy holder; and the death of Brandy Martell. Plus Becky's rants, music made by our community and other community news. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary:
It's a jam-packed show with Becky's take on a pastor who calls for abuse of gender-variant children; the latest on CeCe McDonald; a Texas transgender woman charged with disorderly conduct for using the bathroom; NAT GEO's American Transgender; Aetna Insurance denying a mammogram to a transgender policy holder; and the death of Brandy Martell.
Plus Becky's rants, music made by our community and other community news. Join us!
The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show April 26, 2012 with Mara Keisling
item.description: NCTE's Mara Keisling finds solid reasons for optimism in spite of Obama's ENDA disappointment and other setbacks, plus she adds to her wide-ranging remarks on Melissa Harris-Perry's recent MSNBC "Being Transgender in America" roundtable discussion. Mara is Becky's guest in Hour 2. Hour 1 Becky brings you the latest news and comment, plus classic opinion, and quality music made by our community. She even has something surprising to say about Fox talking head Bill O'Rielly. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary:

Hour 1 Becky brings you the latest news and comment, plus classic opinion, and quality music made by our community. She even has something surprising to say about Fox talking head Bill O'Rielly. Join us!
The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show April 19, 2012
item.description: The President takes a disappointing turn on workplace rights, MSNBC in depth transgender discussion. Plus Becky's rants, music made by our community and other community news. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 4-5-12
item.description: A lame religious boycott of Starbucks fails, Keith Olbermann exits Current TV, Jenna Talacklova and Miss Universe, a Transgender murder, HuffPo's Gay Voices celebrates a milestone. Plus Becky's most excellent rants, music made by our community and other community news. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 3-22-2012 w/guest Riki Wilchins
item.description: Special guest: Riki Wilchins, and the conversation is wide-ranging and interesting! All the news and rants of the day and Becky's commentary plus we discover new music made by our community. A Miss Universe candidate answers inappropriate questions, Obama and gay marriage, the Maryland transgender bill...and much more. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 3-15-12
item.description: All the news and rants of the day and Becky's commentary plus we discover new music made by our community. GLAAD's new commentator accountability project, a hateful rock band invades a school assembly, diner customers come to the aid of a TV actor playing a transgender youth, Mike Scott remembers Peter Bergman, late Firesign Theatre member who followed the show...and much more. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 3-8-12
item.description: The hateful words of Rush Limbaugh, TG employee rights on the table, Janet Mock's media appearances and Mike Scott's strange premonitions about solar flares (which may have done some damage during a replay of this show). All the news of the day and Becky's commentary plus we discover new music made by our community. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 2-16-12
item.description: Becky rants about the late Andrew Breitbart (still among the living the day this was recorded) and community cohesiveness, plus the Griot's Janet Mock. Mara Keisling joins Becky for a spirited discussion that's all over the map in hour 2. All the news of the day and Becky's commentary plus we discover new music made by our community. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 2-23-12
item.description: It's a wide ranging discussion in this episode, from a closeted Arizona Sheriff to the Baltimore County ban on transgender discrimination. All the news of the day and Becky's commentary plus we discover new music made by our community. Join us! The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast is a critical and transformative work that constitutes a Fair Use in accordance with Title 17 U.S.C. Section 107.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 11-10-11 (with Guest Mike Rogers - Blogactive - Raw Story)
item.description: Becky is joined by activist and blogger Mike Rogers, creator of Blogactive and Raw Story. Plus news, rants, listener calls and a visit with Q1 RSU show host Rye Seronie. This transformative remix work constitutes a fair use of any copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the US copyright law. “The Rebecca Juro Podcast" is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 3.0 License permitting non-commercial sharing and remixing with attribution.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 11-3-11 (Bil Browning, Bilerico Project)
item.description: Becky is joined by Bil Browning, and the topics are interesting and wide-ranging. Plus Community news, music made by queer artists, Becky's rants and more. This transformative remix work constitutes a fair use of any copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the US copyright law. “The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast” is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 3.0 License permitting non-commercial sharing and remixing with attribution.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 10-27-11 (Jeramie Davis, Stonewall Dems)
item.description: Guest Jerame Davis, interim Executive Director of National Stonewall Democrats, joins Becky in an informative interview about the past and future of the organization and the party's prospects in 2012. It's about feet on the ground and much more! Plus Becky's blend of community news, music, rants and phone calls. Join us! Complete show: Join Becky for a great and fun interview with AmericaBlog's John Aravosis plus great music made by the community plus News, Rants and more! This transformative remix work constitutes a fair use of any copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the US copyright law. “The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast" is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 3.0 License permitting non-commercial sharing and remixing with attribution

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 10-13-11 (Justin Adkins)
item.description: Occupy Wall Street has been effective, full of hope, frustrating, and marked by police abuse. Becky's guest Justin Adkins is a transman who was arrested and subjected to highly questionable treatment by the NYPD, and he describes his participation and incarceration in detail. Becky's classic rant includes unexpected targets, plus community news and outstanding music of our community. Join us! This transformative remix work constitutes a fair use of any copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the US copyright law. “The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast" is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 3.0 License permitting non-commercial sharing and remixing with attribution.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 9-28-11 (Babs Casbar Siperstein)
item.description: Babs Casbar Siperstein brings much insight into her interview with Becky on this episode. Babs is Co-Chair of the National Stonewall PAC, Director of GRAANJJ (Gender Rights Advocacy Association of NJ) and a member of the NJ Civil Union Review Commission. Plus Becky's rants, great music from our community and a look at community news. Join us! On Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/babscasbar.siperstein Fair Use Notice & Licensing: This transformative remix work constitutes a fair use of any copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the US copyright law. “The Rebecca Juro Show Podcast" is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 3.0 License permitting non-commercial sharing and remixing with attribution.

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 9-8-11
item.description: A noxious TV 'shrink' is in Becky's sights this show, with rants to get you mad and motivated, community news, some outstanding music and even a visit from great friend of the show, Rye Seronie. Plus Mike Scott battles flu-induced weirdness makes it a fun one you shouldn't miss!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: A noxious TV 'shrink' is in Becky's sights this show, with rants to get you mad and motivated, community news, some outstanding music and even a visit from great friend of the show, Rye Seronie. Plus Mike Scott battles flu-induced weirdness makes it a fun one you shouldn't miss!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 8-25-11 w/Dionne Stallworth
item.description: Early GenderPAC member and activist Dionne Stallworth joins Becky for a bit of history, observations on the nature of humanity and basic rights and a lot of insight into the community's current circumstances. Becky rants on Chaz Bono, CNN's Don Lemon and more. It's 'anything can happen day!' as Mike Scott uses the gentle 'sledgehammer method' to reset the streaming media server. Join us! (Recorded from the live broadcast on www.q1.fm of 8-25-11.)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro

(Recorded from the live broadcast on www.q1.fm of 8-25-11.)

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 8-18-11 w/Monica Roberts (TransGriot)
item.description: Writer, activist and blogger Monica Roberts joins Becky from Houston, Texas and you know Presidential hopeful Rick Perry gets a close look, but that's just the beginning! It's a stimulating show with Monica's perspective as an African-American transwoman, Becky's rants, music, news and your community in your ears. Join us! TransGriot: http://transgriot.blogspot.com

item.title: Pod Extra: Becky Juro with John Aravosis 7-7-11
item.description: In this excerpt from the Rebecca Juro Show recorded July 7, 2011 AmericaBlog and AmericaBlog Gay's John Aravosis joins Becky for a wide ranging interview on ENDA, the Obama administration's effectiveness on LGBT rights and a long list of other issues. Fun and engrossing. Join us!

Fun and engrossing. Join us!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 7-28
item.description: Dr. Dana Beyer joins Becky. Plus Becky's rants, great music and community news. Join us!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Dana Beyer joins Becky. Plus Becky's rants, great music and community news. Join us!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show Podcast 7-21-11 w//Ethan St. Pierre
item.description: Join Becky and Guest Ethan St. Pierre for a wide-ranging and spirited discussion, plus community news, Becky's rants and some great music.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Join Becky and Guest Ethan St. Pierre for a wide-ranging and spirited discussion, plus community news, Becky's rants and some great music.

item.title: REBECCA JURO SHOW 6-30-11 W/guest Rebecca Heineman
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro

item.title: REBECCA JURO SHOW 4-28-11 w/Ethan St. Pierre
item.description: TransFM's Ethan St. Pierre lends his insights into the brutal attack on Chrissie Lee Polis, and there's much more on our plates in this excellent episode. Becky's rant, community news, some outstanding music plus serious and fun audios from Mike Scott. Free to you, our wonderful friends!

item.title: Special Edition Podcast: On The Baltimore McDonald's Attack
item.description: My thoughts on the horrific attack of Chrissy Lee Polis at a Baltimore McDonald's.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: My thoughts on the horrific attack of Chrissy Lee Polis at a Baltimore McDonald's.

item.title: REBECCA JURO SHOW 4-7-11 w/Mara Keisling, NCTE
item.description: Mara Keisling, Executive Director of National Center for Transgender Equality joins Becky for a wide-ranging interview including DOMA, HRC inclusiveness and Maryland's HB-235, Becky takes on Glenn Beck's rumored 'transition', rants, news and music plus Mike Scott hangs on for dear life in a 55 MPH gale! It'll blow you away. Join us!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro

It'll blow you away. Join us!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show - 3-31-11
item.description: Fun with ENDA, a death threat toward an activist is discussed, news, rants music and fun. You, Becky and Mike make a threesome (whoo-hoo!)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Fun with ENDA, a death threat toward an activist is discussed, news, rants music and fun. You, Becky and Mike make a threesome (whoo-hoo!)

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 3-24-11 w/guest Michael Cole-Schwartz (HRC)
item.description: Michael Cole-Schwartz is Press Secretary for the Human Rights Campaign. Becky has some very relevant and pointed questions for Michael, plus she considers the good and bad of the HRC in a classic rant, shares some great TG artist music and welcomes caller Ethan St. Pierre. An embarassed Mike Scott confesses his love for the music of Michael Jackson. Join us for a wild ride!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Michael Cole-Schwartz is Press Secretary for the Human Rights Campaign. Becky has some very relevant and pointed questions for Michael, plus she considers the good and bad of the HRC in a classic rant, shares some great TG artist music and welcomes caller Ethan St. Pierre. An embarassed Mike Scott confesses his love for the music of Michael Jackson. Join us for a wild ride!

item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 2-10-11 w/ Babs Casbar Siperstein
item.description: Join Becky for a fast paced, free-range and fun show featuring Babs Casbar Siperstein, of National Stonewall Democrats PAC. We'll deconstruct Glenn Beck, sample new music, and wonder about CPAC and Dick Cheney's lack of a heart. Oh, and there's Becky's controversial invite to the big 2011 Greater New York Human Rights Campaign Gala at the Waldorf! Plus Mike Scott practices his best voiceover guy voice, and groks on the Octomom!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Join Becky for a fast paced, free-range and fun show featuring Babs Casbar Siperstein, of National Stonewall Democrats PAC. item.title: Rebecca Juro Show 2-3-11 w/ Mara Keisling
item.description: Becky's guest Mara Keisling checks in from Creating Change on ENDA and much more. There's community news, Becky's rants, some great music and Mike Scott is fascinated by his blinky new pushbuttons! Join us for a fun, fast paced show that's all about creating our own life changes, everyday.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Becky's guest Mara Keisling checks in from Creating Change on ENDA and much more. item.title: Rebecca Juro 1-27-11 w/ Nicky Stallard
item.description: Becky's guest is transwoman Nicky Stallard, who knows her way around the Tea Party, is a Ron Paul Libertarian, plus Nicky an active member of the Pink Pistols queer gun advocacy organization. She makes a strong argument for a government 'hands-off' on gay marriage, and supports personal protection gun ownership for the community. Becky's rant touches on responses to Keith Olbermann and MSNBC, community news, commentary and music made by us. (technical note: Mike Scott apologizes for the wacked audio during the first part of Nicky's interview, but we know it is interesting stuff, anyway.)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary:
Becky's guest is transwoman Nicky Stallard, who knows her way around the Tea Party, is a Ron Paul Libertarian, plus Nicky an active member of the Pink Pistols queer gun advocacy organization. She makes a strong argument for a government 'hands-off' on gay marriage, and supports personal protection gun ownership for the community. Becky's rant touches on responses to Keith Olbermann and MSNBC, community news, commentary and music made by us.
(technical note: Mike Scott apologizes for the wacked audio during the first part of Nicky's interview, but we know it is interesting stuff, anyway.)

item.title: Rebecca Juro 1-20-11 Beyer
item.description: Becky and Dr. Dana Beyer, author of widely circulated op-ed "The Silent T" have a spirited discussion about priorities mixed up: DADT approved instead of ENDA and more. A recap of the blogosphere interest in last week's show including a fundie organization's listening in, community news, Becky's rants and Mike Scott talks nicely to a studio computer (aka 'confuser'). Episode two of our new year, and a new show run!

item.title: Rebecca Juro 1-14-11 w/Autumn Sandeen
item.description: Rebecca rants about Arizona, the media and HRC, special guest Autumn Sandeen on DADT and more, community news, Mike Scott talks about Arizona conservatives acting-out and the cost of SB-1070 in lives. It's great to be back, folks!
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Juro
item.itunes:summary: Rebecca rants about Arizona, the media and HRC, special guest Autumn Sandeen on DADT and more, community news, Mike Scott talks about Arizona conservatives acting-out and the cost of SB-1070 in lives. It's great to be back, folks!
